recipesJson.name: Toffee philosophy
recipesJson.author: nks
recipesJson.description: A thick,sweet toffee ice cream.Rum adds a little of a booze note and it is often used in real life ice creams to add body and balance.It can be vaped right out of the shake and doesn't change for about 5-6 days.At that time and for about 2-3 days VT pudding base shows up a little too much and then suddenly it balances again and stays the same..
